## ParagraphStyleProps.direction property

The reading direction of paragraph content.

**Signature:**

```typescript
direction?: ReadingDirection;
```

## Remarks

- `ltr`<!-- -->: The content goes from left to right.

- `rtl`<!-- -->: The content goes from right to left.
